meta.name: Filter Breaking Geopolitical News with AI Scoring & Telegram Alerts

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
    "score": 8,
    "category": "Trade Policy",
    "alert_topic": "India announces new tariffs on Chinese imports",
    "alert_description": "Government unveils comprehensive tariff structure affecting electronics and manufacturing sectors",
    "impact": "Significant escalation in trade tensions, potential retaliation expected",
    "source": "Times of India",
    "timestamp": "2025-10-25T20:30:00+05:30",
    "link": "https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/article/12345",
    "should_alert": true
  }

parameters.content:
# Geopolitics Breaking News Alert System

**Smart filtering + AI scoring for cost-efficient geopolitical monitoring**

This workflow filters 200+ daily articles down to critical breaking news alerts using keyword filtering and AI urgency scoring.

## üéØ Use Case
Monitor any geopolitical region (India, China, Middle East, Russia-Ukraine) for breaking news. Smart dual-layer filtering reduces AI costs by 80-90%. AI scores urgency (1-10) to distinguish breaking news from routine coverage. Real-time Telegram alerts for high-priority events only.

## üîß How it Works
1. Schedule Trigger runs every 30min (configurable)
2. Load Config from Google Drive (keywords, scoring rules)
3. Fetch RSS from 6 international news sources (~200 articles)
4. Dynamic Filter applies primary + secondary keyword logic (~5 relevant articles)
5. Check Duplicates to skip already-analyzed articles
6. AI Analyzer scores geopolitical urgency (1-10 scale)
7. Send Telegram Alert for consolidated breaking news (score >= threshold)

**Entire documentation available in [Github Repo](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/tree/master)**
#. [N8N Workflow Architecture](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/blob/master/ARCHITECTURE.md)
#. [Config Files](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/tree/master/configs)
#. [Set Up Guide](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/blob/master/SETUP_GUIDE.md)
#. [Different Use Cases](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/blob/master/USE_CASES.md)

## Scheduling Node
currently set at 30 mins interval but change it as per your requirements

## [Loading Config Info.](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/blob/master/ARCHITECTURE.md)

















[1) Link to different config json files](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/tree/master/configs)
[2). Explanation about different config use cases](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/blob/master/USE_CASES.md)

## [Pre-Processing Nodes](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/blob/master/ARCHITECTURE.md)
1. Merge Data coming from various RSS Feeds
2. Clean up info. not required for processing
3. Use the Primary and Secondary Filters from the Load Config File
4. Check for Duplicate Articles (i.e articles already triggered in previous runs) 
5. Create the Dynamic Prompt Generator for use in Breaking News Analyzer Node

## Breaking News Analyzer
1. Used to [Score Articles](https://github.com/devdutta/n8n-geopolitics-breaking-news-alert/blob/master/USE_CASES.md#customizing-scoring-mechanism) for different Alert Levels via the Dynamic System Prompt Generator using Scoring Rules coming from Config Files
2. Uses AI Agent with Open AI Chat Model running gpt-4o-mini (with temperature set at 0.3 for consistent results)

## Data Insertion and Clean Up Nodes
1. Inserts all articles into the "analyzed_articles" n8n Data Table so that duplicate article checks can be done on next runs
2. Clean Up Node - removes articles from "analyzed_articles" N8N Data Table for articles which are more than 7 days old

## Post-Processing Nodes
1. Re-attach Config - To bring the "alert_threshold" (Scoring Threshold) value from the upstream Config Files
2. If Node - Only pass the Articles >6 score to the True Branch (alert_threshold is set to 6)
3. Aggregate Alerts- Aggregates All Alerts passing the threshold
4. Telegram Message Node - Send the aggregated messages to Telegram Chat Node using the Telegram Chat Id again referenced from the Config Files
